document_data.name: Lizardfolk
document_data.mainbody: The '''Lizardfolk language''', also known as '''Lizard man''' or '''Lizardman''', was the racial language of [[lizardfolk]], or "lizard men" as they were otherwise referred to, on both [[Toril]] and across [[Wildspace]].
document_data.Speakers:
Beyond lizardfolk themselves, the Lizardfolk tongue was a common secondary language among [[w:c:spelljammer:hurwaeti|hurwaeti]],<ref> [[lizard king]]s,{{Cite dragon/89/Creature Catalogue|16}} and [[tren]]s.

The Lizardfolk tongue was also somewhat common as a secondary language among [[warrior]]s in [[Hlondeth]]<ref> and fairly common among most [[druid]]s,<ref> including the [[jungle druid]]s of the the [[Church of Ubtao]]. These [[specialty priest]]s, who sought to learn the exotic languages of the creatures that lived around the [[Chultan Peninsula]], commonly knew both the base tongue and its ptera-man dialect.
document_data.Phonology: This language consisted of various growling vowels and sharp consonants. Meaning was typically conveyed through tonal qualities, as well as simple sound.

Derivations.Coliar Lizard Man: A dialect spoken by the lizardmen of the planet [[Coliar]]. Beyond the native lizardmen themselves, it was a common secondary language among [[elves]] of the [[Elven Imperial Fleet]].
Derivations.Firenewt: A dialect spoken by [[firenewt]]s.<ref>{{Cite organized play/LC/One Thing...|22}}<ref group="note" name="firenewt">Note that it is stated in that text that this dialect is distinct from, and spoken in addition to, the "Firenewt language". The racial language of the firenewts is not stated to be derived from the Lizardfolk tongue.
Derivations.Ptera-man: A dialect spoken by the [[pteramen]] of [[Chult]].
Derivations.Tren: Trens, being that they were crossbreeds between lizardfolk and [[troglodyte]]s, occasionally spoke their own creole language derived from combining the Lizardman and [[Troglodyte language|Troglodyte]] tongues.
Derivations.Western creole: Also known as '''Lizard creole''', a distinct dialect of [[Sespechian]] spoken in [[Sespech]] that combined elements of that language with the Lizardfolk tongue used by the lizardmen of [[Surkh]].{{Cite dragon/Speaking in Tongues|29}}

Dictionary.Unknown Words: The Lizardfolk tongue included words for "boredom",<ref>{{Cite organized play/LC/Twilight of the Dirty Turtles|8}} "prey",<ref> and "special friend".<ref><ref group="note" name="word">What exactly these words are is never stated within the cited texts.
